## FrameStats.addMessage() method

Add a text message to the frame, like "Font XYZ has been loaded"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addMessage(message: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | string | The message to add. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
